title: NEW Keyword Research for Amazon KDP in 2022
description:
Are you looking for a new way of keyword research for Amazon KDP in 2022? What if you could find great keywords for publishing on Kindle AND ACX? This means for the first time ever, you get Audible keywords. Follow along in this short tutorial covering what you need to do to make it happen.

🚀 Publisher Rocket - https://DaleLinks.com/Rocket
💻 DS Amazon Quick View - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ds-amazon-quick-view/jkompbllimaoekaogchhkmkdogpkhojg?hl=en
🔑 Amazon Keywords for Books - https://DaleLinks.com/KeywordsBook (Amazon)

🔐 KDP Keywords | How to Select Profitable Kindle Keywords - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0MGScURA7uU&list=PLXCkkWHluK4C68d3BRXCuR2rn0iYjaj5e&index=1&t=1s
